mapper.insert: insert into t_green_rw_rwmx (c_userid, c_rwlb, c_rwday, c_rwmouth, d_rwsj, c_bz, c_zt, c_cjuser, d_cjsj, c_xguser, d_xgsj) values (#{cUserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cRwlb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cRwday,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cRwmouth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dRwsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cBz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cZt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cCjuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dCjsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cXguser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dXgsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select c_userid, c_rwlb, c_rwday, c_rwmouth, d_rwsj, c_bz, c_zt, c_cjuser, d_cjsj, c_xguser, d_xgsj from t_green_rw_rwmx
